message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is quite a bit higher than that for me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $13,000?
